scripts.build:dev-launcher: cd packages/expo-dev-launcher && yarn install && yarn tsc && yarn bundle && cd ../.. && yarn install
scripts.build:ios-local: eas build --platform ios --profile ios-simulator --local --output ./build/ios-simulator.tar.gz && rm -rf ./build/extracted-app && mkdir -p ./build/extracted-app && tar -xzf ./build/ios-simulator.tar.gz -C ./build/extracted-app && APP_PATH=$(find ./build/extracted-app -name "*.app" -maxdepth 3 | head -n 1) && [ -n "$APP_PATH" ] && xcrun simctl install booted "$APP_PATH" || { echo "Error: .app file not found after extraction or build failed."; exit 1; }
scripts.build:android-local: eas build --platform android --profile android-simulator --local --output ./build/android-simulator.tar.gz && rm -rf ./build/extracted-app && mkdir -p ./build/extracted-app && tar -xzf ./build/android-simulator.tar.gz -C ./build/extracted-app && APP_PATH=$(find ./build/extracted-app -name "*.apk" -maxdepth 3 | head -n 1) && [ -n "$APP_PATH" ] && adb install "$APP_PATH" || { echo "Error: .apk file not found after extraction or build failed."; exit 1; }
scripts.install:ios-local: rm -rf ./build/extracted-app && mkdir -p ./build/extracted-app && tar -xzf ./build/ios-simulator.tar.gz -C ./build/extracted-app && APP_PATH=$(find ./build/extracted-app -name "*.app" -maxdepth 3 | head -n 1) && [ -n "$APP_PATH" ] && xcrun simctl install booted "$APP_PATH" || { echo "Error: .app file not found after extraction or archive missing."; exit 1; }
